item.title: Try Try
item.description: Graph as data flows Who Know It’s another kind of waste. simplify to the logic of state transfer object & connection/field/force from a list to another list from fact/news to insight and knowledge from raw materials to products from electronics to intelligence/robot the evolution of technology and society. a matter of flow rather than inventory static/dynamic view what can you contribute to the process between transfer/transform make a better chart does not make it more meaningful but you can trace back to the tedious life?

item.title: R & RMarkdown Quick Start
item.description: Introduction R Vs Pandas/Python library() source(.R) ~ import getwd() ~ os.getcwd() setwd(â€˜/â€™) ~ os.chdir(â€˜\â€™) df <- read.csv(path) ~ df=pd.read_csv(path) unique(df\(col) ~ df.col.unique() summary(df\)col) ~ df.col.describe() sum ~ sum cor(df[,c(â€˜aâ€™,â€˜bâ€™)]) ~df[[â€˜aâ€™,â€˜bâ€™]].corr() %in% ~ isin() subset(df,a==â€˜aâ€™&b=â€˜bâ€™) ~ df[(df.a==â€˜aâ€™)&(df.b==â€˜bâ€™)] %>% length(df$col) ~ df.col.shape merged = df1.merge(df2, on=â€˜idâ€™) ~ merged=df1.merge(df2,on=â€˜idâ€™) ?module ~ help(module) Data Structure c/list/array/matrix/factor/data.frame factor() behave like set() in python Control Flow function(input){} for (indx in start:end){} if (cond) {} else {} ifelse(cond,ifyes,ifno) switch(,do1,do2,â€¦)

item.title: A brief Introduction to DOT language
item.description: Free from the Restrictions I have been quite obsessed with fancy tools and techniques. Before I met DOT, I have tried many tools to reorganize my thought. Such as Visio, Grapholite, SimpleMind, Xmind, MindNode, iMindMap barabara, such a long list. Each software has its own charming features as well as some minor restrictions. But what’s annoying most for a perfectionist is to finetune the layout and format. DOT actually gives you the opportunity to free yourself from those trivial matters, what you need to do is just focus on your own thinking and leave the rest to DOT.

item.title: New Year's Plan 2018
item.description: Say hi, say bye! Say goodbye to yesterday low-efficiency and embrace a brand-new, productive lifestyle. Cliche as always. I don’t recall how many blogs I have created before. But I’m sure this blog will be well maintained as long as I’m able to write. Consider this article as the debut of ‘I do’ new episode, as well as the end of ‘Hello World’ storyline.

Error 404: Page Not Found Oopsie! It seems that the page that you’re trying to access doesn’t exist. ğŸ˜Ÿ If you’re sure that it exists, chances are it might have been moved to a new link! You may search for it on the home page.

About Me Hi, I’m Leon, an engineer in the HDD industry, and also an advocate of internet, python and high-tech. Writing is not an easy task for me. But life shouldn’t be easy, so here I am and as well as in other areas. If you are interested in knowing more, read my articles or visit my resume.

# PyTorch to MXNet This cheatsheet serves as a quick reference for PyTorch users. Pytorch Tensor and MXNet NDArray Tensor operation We document PyTorch function names that are different than MXNet NDArray Function PyTorch MXNet Gluon Element-wise inverse cosine x.acos() or torch.acos(x) nd.arccos(x) Batch Matrix product and accumulation torch.addbmm(M, batch1, batch2) nd.linalg_gemm(M, batch1, batch2) Leading n-2 dim are reduced Element-wise division of t1, t2, multiply v, and add t torch.

%% Example with selection of syntaxes gantt dateForma[README](images/README.md)t YYYY-MM-DD title Adding GANTT diagram functionality to mermaid section A section Completed task :done, des1, 2014-01-06,2014-01-08 Active task :active, des2, 2014-01-09, 3d Future task : des3, after des2, 5d Future task2 : des4, after des3, 5d section Critical tasks Completed task in the critical line :crit, done, 2014-01-06,24h Implement parser and jison :crit, done, after des1, 2d Create tests for parser :crit, active, 3d Future task in critical line :crit, 5d Create tests for renderer :2d Add to mermaid :1d section Documentation Describe gantt syntax :active, a1, after des1, 3d Add gantt diagram to demo page :after a1 , 20h Add another diagram to demo page :doc1, after a1 , 48h section Last section Describe gantt syntax :after doc1, 3d Add gantt diagram to demo page : 20h Add another diagram to demo page : 48h â€‹``` â€‹ â€‹ â€‹ it hopes to provide a nuanced comprehension about the status, opportunities, and needs of AI chip industry.
